name: crowdsec-local-mcp
description: Helps CrowdSec users to write, test and deploy WAF rules, scenarios, parsers etc.
long_description: Provide tools and prompts to help CrowdSec users to write, test and deploy WAF rules, scenarios, parsers etc. in an easy way.

uv_path.title: Path to uv executable
uv_path.description: Path to the 'uv' executable used to run the server.

tools.name: get_waf_top_level_prompt
tools.description: Get the top-level CrowdSec WAF workflow prompt that explains how to approach rule and test creation

tools.name: get_waf_prompt
tools.description: Get the main WAF rule generation prompt for CrowdSec

tools.name: get_waf_examples
tools.description: Get WAF rule generation examples for CrowdSec

tools.name: generate_waf_rule
tools.description: Get the complete WAF rule generation prompt (main prompt + examples) for CrowdSec

tools.name: generate_waf_tests
tools.description: Get the WAF test generation prompt for producing config.yaml and adapted Nuclei templates

tools.name: run_waf_tests
tools.description: Start the WAF harness and execute the provided nuclei test template against it

tools.name: validate_waf_rule
tools.description: Validate that a CrowdSec WAF rule YAML is syntactically correct

tools.name: lint_waf_rule
tools.description: Lint a CrowdSec WAF rule and provide warnings/hints for improvement

tools.name: deploy_waf_rule
tools.description: Get deployment instructions for CrowdSec WAF rules

tools.name: fetch_nuclei_exploit
tools.description: Retrieve nuclei templates from the official repository for a CVE to help with generation of WAF rules

tools.name: manage_waf_stack
tools.description: Start or stop the Docker-based CrowdSec AppSec test stack so the rule can be exercised with allowed and blocked requests

tools.name: curl_waf_endpoint
tools.description: Execute an HTTP request against the local WAF test endpoint (http://localhost:8081)

tools.name: get_scenario_prompt
tools.description: Retrieve the base prompt for authoring CrowdSec scenarios

tools.name: get_scenario_examples
tools.description: Retrieve example CrowdSec scenarios and annotations

tools.name: validate_scenario_yaml
tools.description: Validate CrowdSec scenario YAML structure for required fields

tools.name: lint_scenario_yaml
tools.description: Lint CrowdSec scenario YAML and highlight potential improvements

tools.name: deploy_scenario
tools.description: Retrieve guidance for packaging and deploying a CrowdSec scenario
